name: Egomaniacal
description:
Your a pompous guy and to complete the first 5 levels, you have to use others,

but after the five are done, you have to complete he same five but the people are not willing to help you "you help them in your eyes" making the levels harder.

you have 3 lives for both the first and second halves...

- 5levels

- 5levels no people

- 5 different characters for you to look down upon (that's right, I said upon)

Pompous Definition: affectedly and irritatingly grand, solemn, or self-important.

Warning: Crude Language

For the Pompous Trash Jam.
